name: Sentiment Analysis
semantic_context: Analyze the sentiment of your text
natural_language_description: 这是 Sentiment Analysis 节点。主要用于: Analyze the sentiment of your text

inputText.name: inputText
inputText.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text
inputText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text to Analyze | 作用: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text | (必填项)

detailedResultsNotice.displayName: Sentiment scores are LLM-generated estimates, not statistically rigorous measurements. They may be inconsistent across runs and should be used as rough indicators only.
detailedResultsNotice.name: detailedResultsNotice
detailedResultsNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sentiment scores are LLM-generated estimates, not statistically rigorous measurements. They may be inconsistent across runs and should be used as rough indicators only.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: categories (值: None) - A comma-separated list of categories to analyze
systemPromptTemplate (值: None) - String to use directly as the system prompt template
includeDetailedResults (值: None) - Whether to include sentiment strength and confidence scores in the output
enableAutoFixing (值: None) - Whether to enable auto-fixing (may trigger an additional LLM call if output is broken)
batching (值: None) - Batch processing options for rate limiting
